attributes.action: Waiver all taxes for Pensioners receiving state pensions.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Pensioners usually work for decades to retire into poverty. Once retired their often meagre pension is taxed. Servicemen and women who have qualified by serving the crown loyally for lengthy periods have their pensions taxed. The originator of this petition sees this as a double taxation due to the fact that to qualify for these pensions one has had to work and pay taxes towards their future pension.

rejection.details: This petition ovrelaps with several already in exitience - http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/Pensioners-Tax/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
